We are an individual developer and currently studying at the Zhuhai College of Beijing Institute of Technology, a student at the School of Computer Science. The production of the software was completed by 2 people and is currently version 1.0.

EasyCure version 1 is online. Convenient choice of illness, health article related information, Good health plan recommendation, excellent hospital and pharmacy location service is the biggest feature of this product, and the software supports Chinese and English services.It is convenient for people who can speak Chinese and English.
4.Registration, use and cancellation of ECure accounts
6.Commitment of users legally using ECure services
8.Force majeure, exemption and limitation of liability
Thank you for choosing ECure service. The ECure Service Agreement (hereinafter referred to as this Agreement) is signed by the ECure Team (hereinafter referred to as us)

1、Please read the contents of this agreement carefully. If you have any questions about the content of this agreement or the information on the page, please do not proceed to the next step. You can consult by adding ECure official QQ: 844964206, so that we can explain and explain for you. By clicking on the page or by other means, you agree to this Agreement.\n 2.If we modify this agreement, we will notify you by popping up the window. If you are unable to agree to change the content of the revised agreement, you have the right to stop using the related services; if the two parties agree, the relevant services and corresponding agreement contents may be changed separately.\n 3.If you are a person without civil capacity or a person with limited capacity for civil conduct, please inform your guardian and read this agreement and use our services under the direction of your guardian. If you are not a user within the territory of the People\'s Republic of China (for the purposes of this agreement, excluding Hong Kong, Macao Special Administrative Region and Taiwan), you must also abide by the laws of your country or region, and you will confirm that you have entered into and traveled this Agreement. Violation of laws and regulations of the country or region in which you belong, reside or conduct business or other business.

1、ECure account (or "account"): refers to the account that you obtained after you obtained the ECure login account and verified by mobile phone for you to use the ECure service.
 2、ECure login account: refers to the mobile phone number that receives the verification code during the process of registering the ECure account. This mobile phone number will be used as the login account of your ECure account.
 3、Identity element: refers to the information element we use to identify you. Currently, we only support SMS verification code verification.
 4、Nickname: refers to the account name that you open to the public. We treat the user's account number (ie mobile phone number) confidentially, that is, do not disclose the mobile phone number.
 5、Official QQ: 844964206

1、Condition selection: The user selects the relevant condition in combination with his or her own symptoms, and further confirms the condition according to the clinical manifestation corresponding to the condition. After selecting the disease, a medical record will be generated. The user can roughly judge the current physical condition according to the description in the case, and the recommended drugs corresponding to the relevant disease are also given in the case.
 2、Drug recommendation: We recommend several drugs with higher sales and heat for the basic symptoms selected by the user, but only for screening. The drugs recommended by the system can only be used as users.The reference drug for selecting a basic condition, such as a serious condition, is not a target of the service, and it is strongly recommended that you go to the hospital in time. 
 3、Health Information: We will update the Health Information Module regularly to ensure that users can learn some of the common health tips in the life of the article and keep the user's health information fresh in a regularly updated way.
 4、Health knowledge: We will make recommendations on the main parts of the body or some living habits, and let the user know how to do a good job of health and maintenance, so as to develop a good habit.
 5、Memo: The memo function is provided in the software, allowing the user to write the memo content in the software. When the user uses the software again, he will pay attention to the memo information recorded before.
 6、Positioning: We use the positioning system of Gaode map to provide users with location services for surrounding hospitals and pharmacies.
 7、Internationalization: The software provides Chinese and English bilingual support services, and automatically selects the display language according to the user's mobile phone time zone.

1、Registration: All services are available after registration is complete. The nickname you set in your account will be visible to the outside world, and your mobile number (ie login account) will be kept confidential.
 2、Login: We only provide login for this platform (registered users of this platform).
 3、Use: The identity element allows us to identify the basis of your identity, please be sure to keep it safe. The operation using the identity element and the instructions issued are deemed to be made by you. The account, password and other information caused by your reasons are fraudulently used, stolen or illegally used, and the risks and losses caused by you are at your own risk.
 4、Logout: You can only apply for cancellation of your own account and cancel it in accordance with our procedures. In order to protect the legitimate interests of you and other users, the account you apply for cancellation should have no unresolved rights or obligations or other disputes arising from the cancellation of the account. There are no outstanding transactions.

1. Authentication: In the process of identity verification, please keep the network environment unblocked, and ensure that the network environment is safe and you can log in and check the symptoms. \n 2, the disease query, we launched the disease inquiry service, according to the type of disease - clinical performance to correspond to the user\'s own situation, to determine what type of disease is probably, and provide recommended drugs for reference. But this is only a recommendation and can only be used as a reference. in case Users can indeed determine their own symptoms such as: cough and other common symptoms, you can refer to the results of drug recommendations to buy drugs, and if the user is not sure about the specific disease and the condition is more serious, then do not act The service object of this function, and it is strongly recommended that the user go to the hospital in time for medical treatment. \n

1、You are required to abide by the laws and regulations of the People\'s Republic of China and the countries or regions in which you belong, reside or carry out business activities or other business, and may not use our services for illegal purposes (including transactions for prohibiting or restricting trading goods). ), nor can we use our services illegally.\n 2、You may not use our services to engage in the infringement of the lawful rights and interests of others or violate national laws and regulations, otherwise we have the right to investigate, delay or refuse to settle or stop providing services, and you are responsible for any legal liability, such as this leads us or other If the party is damaged, you will be liable for compensation.

We always adhere to the principle of \"customer first\" and strive to bring you small and beautiful changes. We attach great importance to the protection of your information, and strictly implement the information security protection system to ensure that your user data will not be leaked, create a good network environment for you, and enhance your user experience.

1、Do not use, modify, decompile, reproduce, publicly transmit, alter, distribute, make hairstyles or publicly publish ECure programs or content without our written consent;\n2、Respect for intellectual property rights is also your obligation. If there is a violation, you will be liable for damages.
